Delete referendums from the RDB

Source: R/rdb.gen.R
delete_rfrnds.Rd

Deletes data from the RDB's referendums table.

Usage

delete_rfrnds(data, connection = connect(), disconnect = TRUE)

Arguments

data

Referendum data to be deleted. A tibble that at least must contain the column id.

connection

Database connection to a PostgreSQL DBMS as returned by connect(). An S4 object that inherits from DBI::DBIConnection.

disconnect

Whether or not to terminate the database connection when finished.

Value

The updated referendums table data as a tibble, invisibly.

See also

Other administration functions: config_nocodb_tbls(), connect(), create_nocodb_tbls(), dm(), notify_postgrest(), reset_nocodb(), reset_rdb(), restart_postgrest(), update_countries(), update_langs(), update_municipalities(), update_rfrnds(), update_subnational_entities(), update_tbl()

Other data functions: assert_vars(), download_file_attachments(), read_tbl(), rfrnd_types(), rfrnds(), rfrnds_old(), validate_rfrnds()
